courses.title: Introduction to Music Theory
courses.description: A beginner-friendly course to understand the fundamental principles of music theory. Learn about scales, chords, rhythm, and harmony.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Dive deep into advanced guitar playing techniques including fingerpicking, sweep picking, and improvisation for experienced guitarists.

courses.title: Electronic Music Production
courses.description: Learn how to create electronic music using DAWs (Digital Audio Workstations) like Ableton and Logic Pro. Master the art of sound design and arrangement.

courses.title: Music Composition for Film & TV
courses.description: This course teaches the essentials of composing music for visual media, including scoring for film, television, and video games.

courses.title: Classical Piano Mastery
courses.description: Perfect your classical piano skills with detailed lessons on technique, performance, and music interpretation.

courses.title: Vocal Performance & Technique
courses.description: Master the art of singing with a focus on vocal techniques, breathing exercises, and stage presence for aspiring performers.
